name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Cloud Engineer with 13+ years of experience in cloud operations and infrastructure management, specializing in **AWS**, **Azure**, and **GCP**. Proficient in automation, leveraging **Terraform** and **Ansible** for efficient deployments. Adept in **CI/CD** practices, utilizing tools like **Jenkins** and **Git** to streamline development workflows.
Strong programming skills in **Python** and **Node.js**, coupled with extensive knowledge of **Linux** and **Windows** environments. Experienced in implementing **Kubernetes** for container orchestration and ensuring high availability of applications.
Demonstrated expertise in compliance-driven development, aligning solutions with HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 standards. Background includes building AI/ML-powered platforms and MLOps practices for model training and orchestration using **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
